title: I can’t get a seed to work in Bedrock

Every time I try to use a seed that someone recommended on YouTube or Reddit it does not generate the same map as they are showing. Is there something wrong with my settings? Or do seeds just not work like they used to?

title: I need help with an error message
self_text:
Hi everyone, 
I'm having a problem with Minecraft on my PC. When I launch the game, it gives me an error message that says "Unable to start the game". I've tried everything I can think of, but nothing seems to work.  

Here's some information about my system:
* Operating System: Windows 10 64-bit
* Java Version: Java 8 Update 371
* Minecraft Version: 1.20.1
* Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
* CPU: Intel Core i5-4670K @ 3.40GHz
* RAM: 16GB

Has anyone else encountered this issue? If so, how did you fix it? Any help would be appreciated! Thanks in advance!

title: Why does my Minecraft game get to the point where it crashes?
self_text: I'm using a new PC with an RTX 3060, and when i play for around 5-15 minutes, the screen goes black or freezes up, but I can still hear the sounds of the game running in the background, so then I have to force close the game and restart it again. Is there anything I could do that might help?

I think it might be because the server needs to run on an older version of Bedrock servers than the current ones.  Is there a way to do this?
